{"id":1082088285,"question_id":342,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1698061683,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1082088285/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Power of Four","memory":"6.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    Solution(){\n        ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n        cin.tie(nullptr);\n        cout.tie(nullptr);\n    }\n    \n    bool isPowerOfFour(int n) {\n        \n        if(n<=0){\n            return false;\n        }\n        else if(n==1){\n            return true;\n        }\n        else{\n            if(0<n && n<1){\n                return isPowerOfFour(pow(n,-1));\n            }\n            else{\n                if(n%4==0){\n                    return isPowerOfFour(n/4);\n                }\n                else{\n                    return false;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"power-of-four","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
